articles.title: Bees can play soccer - 10 little-known facts about insects
articles.description: If the climate crisis leads to an insect die-off, human life will be less livable â€“ and more boring
articles.content:
The labyrinthine world of insects is in deep trouble. Scientists have uncovered startling declines in their populations , with the United Nations estimating that half a million species could be lost by the midpoint of this century.
In writing about t... [8196 chars]

articles.title: "The birds and the bees." Meaning and origin of the phrase
articles.description: The birds and the bees is a story parents tell their children to deflect the question "Where do babies come from?" The phrase refers to the talk about sex.
articles.content:
The Birds and the Bees is a story parents tell their children to deflect the question "Where do babies come from?"
The phrase "the birds and the bees" is a term used to explain the mechanics of reproduction to younger children, relying on the imagery... [3240 chars]

articles.title: Bees Ejaculate Themselves To Death If Things Get Too Hot
articles.description: It turns out that when drones die in extreme heat, their last act is to ejaculate out a part of their own abdomen.
articles.content:
A drone that has ejaculated out a part of its abdomen. Image credit: Dr. Alison McAfee/University of British Columbia .
If you've ever seen a dead bee that looks like it has partly exploded, there's a good chance it died a more NSFW death than you're... [2858 chars]

articles.title: B.C. fugitive worked for a Puerto Rican charity, lived in a penthouse
articles.description: He was known as Johnny Williams, a purported American philanthropist committed to saving the unique bees of Puerto Rico. But in reality, Williams is B.C. fugitive Conor D'Monte, a 44-year-old United Nations gang leader who had been on the run for 11 years after being charged with murder and conspiracy.

articles.title: Brentford 0-2 Newcastle: Magpies cruise to win at Bees as Christian Eriksen makes long-awaited return
articles.description: Match report and highlights as Newcastle earn comfortable 2-0 win at Brentford, who have Josh Dasilva sent off after 11 minutes; Joelinton and Joe Willock score in first half to lift Magpies above their hosts in the table; Christian Eriksen makes emotional return as second-half substitute
articles.content:
Christian Eriksen's remarkable return to professional football was a rare bright spot for 10-man Brentford as their wretched form continued with a 2-0 home defeat to relegation rivals Newcastle.
The Denmark international came on as a second-half subs... [4990 chars]
